2300740.reference:
Reference  : Al-Adab Al-Mufrad 2300740
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 3, Hadith 001
2300740.text: 'Abdu'r-Rahman ibn Habib said, "'Abdullah ibn 'Umar asked me, 'Which clan are you from?' I replied, 'From Taym of Tamim.' He asked, 'One of themselves or one of their mawlas?' 'One of their mawlas,' I replied. He said, 'So why did you not say, 'One of their mawlas'?"

2300750.reference:
Reference  : Al-Adab Al-Mufrad 2300750
In-book reference  : Book 3, Hadith 002
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 3, Hadith 002
2300750.text: our friends among you are those who have taqwa of Allah. If you are one of them, then that is good. If that is not the case, then look out. People will bring their actions on the Day of Rising and you will come with burdens and you will be shunned." Then he called out, "O people!" He raised his hands and put them on the heads of Quraysh. "O people! Quraysh are the people of trustworthiness. If anyone who oppresses them (and one of the transmitters thought that he said, 'faults them'), Allah will overturn him." He repeated that three times.
